## The type

Obtains the TypeScript type of the given runtime Type-checker. Aka [TypeOf](./types.typeof.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type The<T> = TypeOf<T>;
```

<b>References:</b> [TypeOf](./types.typeof.md)
